{{< brang logo large >}}

```{r}
#| label: setup
source('R/_libraries.R')
source('R/custom_table_functions.R')
source('R/custom_functions.R')

load('data/study_data.rda')
```


```{r}
#| label: tables
tbl_summary(
  the_data, by = use_category, 
  include = c(ridageyr, contains('kdm')),
  statistic = list(all_continuous() ~ '{mean} ({sd})')
  # missing = 'no'
) |> 
  extras()
```

Use variables included in Robert's models too. 

```{r}
lm(kdm_bioage ~ use_category + riagendr, data = the_data) |> 
  tidy()
lm(kdm_advance ~ use_category + riagendr, data = the_data) |> 
  tidy()
```
